Uses of Class
org.jacpfx.rcp.context.AsyncHandler

  • Packages that use AsyncHandler 
    Package Description
    org.jacpfx.rcp.context  

    • Uses of AsyncHandler in org.jacpfx.rcp.context

      Methods in org.jacpfx.rcp.context that return AsyncHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AsyncHandler<?> JacpContextImpl.asyncHandler()
      The async handler allows to supply consumers, suppliers and function on worker thread and on FX thread
      AsyncHandler<?> Context.asyncHandler()
      The async handler allows to supply consumers, suppliers and function on worker thread and on FX thread
      AsyncHandler<java.lang.Void> AsyncHandler.consumeOnExecutorThread(java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)
      accepts an Consumer to be applyed on worker thread.
      AsyncHandler<java.lang.Void> AsyncHandler.consumeOnFXThread(java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)
      accepts an Consumer to be applyed on JavaFX application thread.
      <V> AsyncHandler<V> AsyncHandler.functionOnExecutorThread(java.util.function.Function<T,V> function)
      accepts an Function to be applyed on worker thread.
      <V> AsyncHandler<V> AsyncHandler.functionOnFXThread(java.util.function.Function<T,V> function)
      accepts an Function to be applyed on JavaFX application thread.
      static <T> AsyncHandler AsyncHandler.getInstance()
      Returns an instace of async handler
      <T> AsyncHandler<T> AsyncHandler.supplyOnExecutorThread(java.util.function.Supplier<T> supplier)
      accepts an Supplier to be applyed on worker thread.
      <T> AsyncHandler<T> AsyncHandler.supplyOnFXThread(java.util.function.Supplier<T> supplier)
      accepts an Supplier to be applyed on JavaFX application thread.
